Huffman Codes are : 
m 11111
r 11110
  110
i 1011
a 1010
C 00000
A 00001
g 0001
v 00100
h 1110
. 00101
o 01011
y 00110
l 01010
k 00111
T 01000
f 01001
s 100
e 011

Original string was : This is a large message from Avishek Chy.

Encoded string is : 010001110101110011010111001101010110010101010111100001011110111110111001001010000101111001001111100101111111110000010010010111001110011001111100000011100011000101

Decoded string is: This is a large message from Avishek Chy.
